content.en: Sepsis algorithm optimization: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms to improve the diagnosis and treatment of early-onset sepsis in newborns. These algorithms, developed by various organizations such as the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and the Neonatal Sepsis Calculator, aim to optimize antibiotic use and resource utilization. By implementing these algorithms, healthcare providers can better identify and manage sepsis, potentially reducing unnecessary antibiotic treatment and improving outcomes for newborns.
content.da: Sepsis-algoritmeoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre diagnostik og behandling af tidlig sepsis hos nyfødte. Disse algoritmer, udviklet af forskellige organisationer såsom Centers for Disease Control and Prevention og Neonatal Sepsis Calculator, sigter mod at optimere antibiotikabrug og ressourceanvendelse. Ved at implementere disse algoritmer kan sundhedspersonale bedre identificere og håndtere sepsis, potentielt reducere unødvendig antibiotikabehandling og forbedre resultaterne for nyfødte.
